原始数据.标题: Who Needs A.I. Music When We Have Bruno Mars?
原始数据.内容: Our critic Jon Caramanica on the smooth pop sound of Bruno Mars’s new single.

原始数据.标题: Not to be outdone by OpenAI, Apple is reportedly developing an AI wearable
原始数据.内容: Should this wearable materialize, it could be released as early as 2027, according to a report on the device.

原始数据.标题: Sources: Project SGLang spins out as RadixArk with $400M valuation as inference market explodes
原始数据.内容: SGLang, which originated as an open source research project at Ion Stoica’s UC Berkeley lab, has raised capital from Accel.

原始数据.标题: A timeline of the US semiconductor market in 2025
原始数据.内容: From leadership changes at legacy semiconductor companies to wishy washy policy around chip exports, a lot happened last year.

原始数据.标题: Todoist’s app now lets you add tasks to your to-do list by speaking to its AI
原始数据.内容: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.
